## detectParameterReordering() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Detects if parameters have been reordered between two signatures.

This provides rich analysis including: - Whether reordering is detected - Confidence level based on the evidence - Detailed per-position analysis with similarity scores - Human-readable interpretations for user feedback

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function detectParameterReordering(
  oldParams: ParameterInfo[],
  newParams: ParameterInfo[],
): ParameterOrderAnalysis
```
